= Installing from Source on Ubuntu =

== Pre-Requisites ==
  * root priviledge
  * scim-dev installed


== Installation process ==
  # Open *terminal*
  # Install *scim-dev*
{{{
sudo apt-get install scim-dev
}}}
  # Download source code from *[http://code.google.com/p/scim-avro/source/checkout]* and go to downloaded directory
  # Change to *super-user* mode
{{{
su
}}}
  # Run *config*. You might need to do *`sudo chmod 777 configure`* first
{{{
./configure
}}}
  # Run *make*
{{{
make
}}}
  # Run *make install*
{{{
make install
}}}
